content.question: The excerpt and its intended audience can best be used to support which of the following explanations of American public opinion in the early twenty-first century?

choices.label: Some Americans viewed reducing dependence on fossil fuels as a way to improve the economy.
Many Americans viewed new taxes as necessary to pay for military efforts in the Middle East.
Many Americans were concerned about the impact of fossil fuel consumption on personal health.
Some Americans viewed war in the Middle East as a way to stimulate the economy.

content.answer: Some Americans viewed reducing dependence on fossil fuels as a way to improve the economy.
